name: A Trip Through The Land of The Undying
name_original: A Trip Through The Land of The Undying
description:
Out of the Box Studios Ojam 2018 Game.

be careful who you insult.  Our player character finds herself in a sticky situation after insulting the wrong Hobo who turns out to be an evil wizard.  she is cursed to the land of undying were she must dodge zombies while collecting presents to trade for power ups, and her way home.
